description: How to waterproof bathtub against KERDI-BOARD…I apply thin-set to the wall then apply KERDI-FIX against the tub flange. This seals the banding to the tub and the wall. One important tip, apply KERDI-FIX after the mortar because it will only remain tacky for 5-10 minutes. If you’re remodeling a shower like this and need help, join our Platinum membership at homerepairtutor.com 👍🏽🔥Many thanks to Schluter for providing the materials for my client’s bathroom remodel 🙏🏽 #showerremodel #bathroomremodel #homerenovation #brandambassador
title: How to Waterproof Bathtub Against KERDI-BOARD - #shorts #homerepairtutor
